main event: A circular, bright white object was observed moving erratically in Ferndale, Michigan on October 12, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 seconds,The object was reported to have a high rate of speed and made erratic movements,It appeared to be in directed or controlled flight,The weather conditions at the time included a strong breeze and rapidly moving clouds,There have been about 25 reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in the area over the past two years.
witness description: unspecified individuals with varying levels of credibility, including some known in the community
